aka: When Whales Walked: a Deep Time Journey
this_title: When Whales Walked: Journeys in Deep Time
trans_title: 鲸鱼行走的时代：深时之旅
When Whales Walked: a Deep Time Journey
introduction: From voracious crocodiles and acrobatic birds to stupendous whales and majestic elephants, When Whales Walked: Journeys in Deep Time follows top scientists on a global adventure as they follow clues from the fossil record and change what we thought we knew about the evolution of iconic beasts.
chinese_title: 鲸鱼行走的时代：深时之旅
foreign_title: When Whales Walked: Journeys in Deep Time
